upsell.text: 👋 Beekeeper Studio is run by a small team. Buy the full version of Beekeeper Studio to support development and get more features. Thank you ♥

connection.title: Connection
connection.activeExportsWarning: There are active exports running. Are you sure you want to disconnect?

ssl.info: Providing certificate files is optional. By default Beekeeper will just trust the server certificate.
ssl.rejectUnauthorizedTooltip: This only takes effect if you provide certificate files

ssh.title: SSH Tunnel
ssh.info: For the SSH tunnel to work, AllowTcpForwarding must be set to "yes" in your ssh server config.
ssh.keepaliveIntervalTooltip:
Ping the server after this many seconds when idle
to prevent getting disconnected due to inactiviy
(like ServerAliveInterval 60 in ssh/config)

agentInfo.snapWarning: SSH Agent Forwarding is not possible with the Snap version of Beekeeper Studio due to the security model of Snap apps.
agentInfo.agentFound: We found your SSH Agent. You're good to go!
agentInfo.windowsInfo: We didn't find a *nix ssh-agent running, so we'll attempt to use the PuTTY agent, pageant.
agentInfo.noAgentWarning: You don't seem to have an SSH agent running.

keyfile.snapWarning: Hey snap user! You need to enable SSH access, then restart Beekeeper to provide access to your .ssh directory.

connection.upgradeForReadOnly: Upgrade to use Read Only Mode
connection.mightNeedTrustCert: You might need to check 'Trust Server Certificate'
connection.notValidSqlite: Unable to open '{name}'. It is not a valid SQLite file.

cockroach.clusterIdTooltip: Go to CockroachDB online -> Connect -> parameters only -> copy from 'options'

sqlite.globalSetting: This is a global setting that affects all SQLite connections.
sqlite.snapWarning: Hey snap user! If you want to use a sqlite database on an external drive you'll need to give Beekeeper some extra permissions

sqlserver.domainTooltip: Set 'domain' to be logged in using Windows Integrated Authentication (NTLM)
sqlserver.trustServerCertificateTooltip: Use this for local dev servers and self-signed certificates. ssl -> rejectUnauthorized overrides this setting if ssl is enabled
sqlserver.serverTooltip:
This is the 'Server name' field on your Sql Server in Azure,
you might also think of this as the hostname.
Eg. example.database.windows.net
sqlserver.tenantIdTooltip:
This can be found in the 'Microsoft Entra ID' section of Azure,
in the Overview labelled 'Tenant ID'

redshift.clusterIdentifierTooltip: This is the identifier for your Amazon Redshift cluster
redshift.dbUserTooltip: The database user to connect as
redshift.regionTooltip: The AWS region your Redshift cluster is in
redshift.iamAuthHelpText: Use AWS IAM authentication using credential file to connect with temporary cluster credentials.
redshift.iamWithKeyAuth: IAM Authentication Using Access Key and Secret Key

bigquery.betaWarning: BigQuery support is still in beta. Please report any problems on
bigquery.serviceAccountInfo: You need a service account with the roles 'BigQuery Data Viewer' and 'BigQuery Job User' -

importButton.unableToDetermineType: Unable to determine database type from the URL

signin.title: Team workspace account sign-in
signin.tooltip: Store connections and queries in the cloud, share with colleagues. Click to learn more.

upgrade.pitch: 🌟 Upgrade for more features like ClickHouse & Oracle support, JSON view for table rows, and more!
upgrade.authenticationRequired: Upgrade required to use this authentication type
upgrade.title: Upgrade Beekeeper Studio

license.expired: Your existing license is not valid for this version of the app
license.buyTooltip: Get lifetime app access with any purchase

trial.tooltip: 14 day free trial, no email or credit card required

upsell.getAccessToFeature: Get access to this feature, plus:

features.connectTo: Connect to Cassandra, Oracle, LibSQL, ClickHouse, and DuckDB.
features.unlockFeatures: Unlock JSON view, unlimited table filters, import/export, backup/restore, and more.
features.supportStaff: Email real support staff, we're here whenever you have a problem.
features.syncData: Sync data across machines with cloud workspaces and team collaboration tools.

trial.upgradeSoon: Upgrade now to make sure you don't lose access.

sqlImport.title: Import SQL Files into Saved Queries
sqlImport.message: This will make a copy of your .sql files and add them to your Beekeeper Studio saved queries. Any changes to the original .sql files will not be reflected in Beekeeper Studio.

importTable.notSupported: Beekeeper does not currently support Import from File for {dialect} ☹️
importTable.abortedWithRollback: The whole import was aborted with a transaction rollback
